attributes.action: Legalise cannabis oil for the treatment of epilepsy & other related illnesses
attributes.background: My daughter has uncontrolled Epilepsy. This started with Absence Seizures at 13 years of age & Tonic Clinic Seizures. She is now 28 years old. She has been on many different Epileptic medication over the years & none have worked for her. Cannabis oil could be her only hope for a cure or control.
